TopicTitle: "Control from here" doesn't work on planes

Articles.Content:
I built a plane that has two separate guidance unit. For some reason, when I tried to switch control from one guidance unit to another by pressing the " control from here" button from the unit I'm switching to, nothing happens. Control does not switch. It works for all my satellites though.  

Please help. Going crazy over this
